page.title: 16A week in my Mum's Life
page.content: My mum goes to work four days a week. On Monday she goes to French lessons in the school. On Monday she also goes into school to help with the cooking. She takes a group of six children with Mrs.Aitken. On Tuesday in the summer she goes to Tennis club and sometimes to the George afterwards. On Thursday she helps take the Cubs at 6.30p.m. and stays at school afterwards for Popmobility. On Friday night my mum sometimes goes to the George with her friends. At the weekends my mum likes to go on a walk. She often walks along the Ridgeway to Barby. This is quite a nice walk because you get good views.
